title: BRAN MAK MORN - The Last King: Men of the Shadows; Kings of the Night; A Song of the Race; Worms of the Earth; The Dark Man; The Lost Race; The Little People; The Children of the Night
description: From the author of the many tales of Conan the barbarian comes sword and sorcery action set in ancient Britain and featuring the last king of a doomed race.
author: Robert E. Howard
